Package graphanalyzer.view

Class MainGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • graphanalyzer.view.MainGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocaleChangeListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class MainGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements LocaleChangeListener, java.io.Serializable
    Main GUI that shows Window with containered panels.

    Folowing panels are all getting initialzed by this class:

    • GraphPanel
    • WelcomePanel
    • DescriptionPanel
    Author:
    Paul Ehler
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
